name: @mscharley/dot
description: A lightweight inversion of control framework for JavaScript and TypeScript

scripts.prepack: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.build: npm run build:tsc && npm run build:api && npm run build:esbuild
scripts.build:api: api-extractor run --local && grep -v 'DecoratorContext' dot.d.ts > dot.v4.d.ts && cp dot.d.ts dot.d.cts && cp dot.v4.d.ts dot.v4.d.cts
scripts.build:docs: api-documenter markdown -i ./reports/docs -o ./docs/reference && for f in docs/reference/*.md; do sed -i -Ee 's@\[Home\]\(\./index\.md\)@[Home](../index.md) \> [Reference](./index.md)@' $f; done
scripts.build:esbuild: npm run build:esbuild:esm && npm run build:esbuild:cjs
scripts.clean: rm -rf dot.* dist/ coverage/ docs/reference reports/ temp/ .stryker-tmp/ tsdoc-metadata.json
scripts.test: npm run test:eslint && npm run build:tsc && npm run test:api && npm run test:tsc:experimental && npm run test:jest && npm run test:cjs-esm-compat
scripts.test:jest: npm run test:jest:experimental && npm run test:jest:tc39
scripts.rebuild-test: npm run clean && npm run build && npm test && npm run stryker && npm run build:docs

author: Matthew Scharley <matt@scharley.me>
